ngiemboon: À júu kwáŋ páʼɔɔn ńdɔgɔ ńgɔɔn ngie à naʼá ńgẅiin nkáb.
en: He buys the bike like that to say he has some money.
He came until he was sleeping.
k. dance instrument used to galvanize the crowd
k. dance instrument used to galvanize the crowd

ngiemboon: Pi pú néŋte shúm sɛ̂ tsɛ̀ɛ pɔ̀ɔn.
en: Put all these things in the bag.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ḿpfɛ́ shúm múɔ, mbà n ge néŋe tsébe gù.
en: If you eat the child's food, then I will punish you.
